targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT toDateTime((intDiv(t, 60) * 60)) AS t, sum(tps) as tpm FROM

(SELECT toUnixTimestamp(timestamp) as t, count() as tps FROM
    (SELECT
         JSON_VALUE(message, '$.event.type') as type,
         JSONExtractRaw(JSONExtractRaw(message, 'event'), 'tags') as tags,
         timestamp
     FROM default.servant_logs WHERE logger = 'UserEventLogs')
WHERE type = '"ExecutionStart"' AND $timeFilter
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t)
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT toDateTime((intDiv(t, 60) * 60)) AS t, sum(tps) as tpm FROM

(SELECT toUnixTimestamp(timestamp) as t, count() as tps FROM
    (SELECT
         JSON_VALUE(message, '$.event.type') as type,
         JSONExtractRaw(JSONExtractRaw(message, 'event'), 'tags') as tags,
         timestamp
     FROM default.servant_logs WHERE logger = 'UserEventLogs')
WHERE type = '"ExecutionStart"' AND toUnixTimestamp(timestamp) >= 1642040907 AND toUnixTimestamp(timestamp) <= 1642084107
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t)
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT toDateTime(t) as t, ok, not_ok FROM (
SELECT intDiv(t, 60 * 60 * 24) * 60 * 60 * 24 AS t, sum(good) as ok, sum(bad) as not_ok FROM

(SELECT toUnixTimestamp(timestamp) as t, countIf(JSONExtractString(tags, 'exit_code') = '0') as good, countIf(JSONExtractString(tags, 'exit_code') != '0') as bad FROM
    (SELECT
         JSON_VALUE(message, '$.event.type') as type,
         JSONExtractRaw(JSONExtractRaw(message, 'event'), 'tags') as tags,
         timestamp
     FROM default.servant_logs WHERE logger = 'UserEventLogs')
WHERE type = '"ExecutionComplete"' AND $timeFilter
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t)
GROUP BY t
HAVING t = max(t)
ORDER BY t)
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT toDateTime(t) as t, ok, not_ok FROM (
SELECT intDiv(t, 60 * 60 * 24) * 60 * 60 * 24 AS t, sum(good) as ok, sum(bad) as not_ok FROM

(SELECT toUnixTimestamp(timestamp) as t, countIf(JSONExtractString(tags, 'exit_code') = '0') as good, countIf(JSONExtractString(tags, 'exit_code') != '0') as bad FROM
    (SELECT
         JSON_VALUE(message, '$.event.type') as type,
         JSONExtractRaw(JSONExtractRaw(message, 'event'), 'tags') as tags,
         timestamp
     FROM default.servant_logs WHERE logger = 'UserEventLogs')
WHERE type = '"ExecutionComplete"' AND toUnixTimestamp(timestamp) >= toDateTime(1642043431) AND toUnixTimestamp(timestamp) <= toDateTime(1642086631)
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t)
GROUP BY t
HAVING t = max(t)
ORDER BY t)

panels.title: ok/not ok tasks per last day

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT uid, count FROM (
SELECT
       JSONExtractString(tags, 'user_id') as uid,
       count() as count,
       (intDiv(timestamp, 60 * 60 * 24) * 60 * 60 * 24) as t
FROM (
        SELECT
             JSON_VALUE(message, '$.event.type') as type,
             JSONExtractRaw(JSONExtractRaw(message, 'event'), 'tags') as tags,
             toUnixTimestamp(timestamp) as timestamp
         FROM default.server_logs WHERE logger = 'UserEventLogs'
)
WHERE type = '"TaskCreate"'
GROUP BY uid, t
HAVING t = max(t)
ORDER BY t)
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT uid, count FROM (
SELECT
       JSONExtractString(tags, 'user_id') as uid,
       count() as count,
       (intDiv(timestamp, 60 * 60 * 24) * 60 * 60 * 24) as t
FROM (
        SELECT
             JSON_VALUE(message, '$.event.type') as type,
             JSONExtractRaw(JSONExtractRaw(message, 'event'), 'tags') as tags,
             toUnixTimestamp(timestamp) as timestamp
         FROM default.server_logs WHERE logger = 'UserEventLogs'
)
WHERE type = '"TaskCreate"'
GROUP BY uid, t
HAVING t = max(t)
ORDER BY t)

panels.title: Tasks by users per last day
